bibl.title: Ordering Women in Hesiod's Catalogue.
The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women. Constructions and Reconstructions
bibl.author: OSBORNE, Robin

bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Is there a poem to read? - The primacy of Pandora. - Orderly women. - Disorderly women. - The ultimacy of Helen.
OSBORNE Robin, Ordering Women in Hesiod's Catalogue.
Richard HUNTER (Ed.), The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women. Constructions and Reconstructions (Cambridge, 2005) pp. 5-24.
